author: Rick Spilman
content: I have deleted an anti-vaxxer comment that attempted to hijack the post. The comment made the claim that “Covid-19 Vaccines Lead to New Infections and Mortality.” They do not. I see no reason to facilitate the spreading of lies so I deleted the comment.

author: Willy
content: Anyone want to go on the hunch they were not actually vaccinated?

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Maybe they were false positives but would YOU be prepared to chance causing all sorts of problems by not acting on it?
